Schnittstelle QuizQuestionDelegator

Alle bekannten Implementierungsklassen:
QuizQuestionMainPanel
public interface QuizQuestionDelegator
Delegate interface for actions performed on the question panel, such as deleting, saving, selecting questions, or creating new ones.

This interface enables communication between UI components and their controlling logic related to quiz question management.

Seit:
1.0
Version:
1.0
Autor:
Christos Poulios

  • Methodendetails

    • onQuestionDeleted

      void onQuestionDeleted(String questionText)
      Called when a question is deleted.
      Parameter:
      questionText - The text or title of the question being deleted

    • onQuestionSaved

      void onQuestionSaved(String questionTitle, String themeTitle, String questionType, String answerText, boolean isCorrect)
      Called when a question is saved.
      Parameter:
      questionTitle - The question's title
      themeTitle - The theme title the question belongs to
      questionType - The type of the question
      answerText - The answer text
      isCorrect - Whether the answer is correct

    • onQuestionSelected

      void onQuestionSelected(String entry, int index)
      Called when a question is selected from the list.
      Parameter:
      entry - The selected entry text
      index - The index of the selected question

    • onNewQuestion

      void onNewQuestion(String themeTitle, String questionType)
      Called when a new question is created.
      Parameter:
      themeTitle - The theme to associate the new question with
      questionType - The type/category of the new question

    • onThemeSelected

      void onThemeSelected(String themeTitle)
      Called when a theme is selected.
      Parameter:
      themeTitle - The selected theme's title
